Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Kade manukha te bite samem vica ika ajiha samam vi a'i'a hai jadom uha ko'i bi'ana karana vali vasatu nahim si
Asim manukha nu ika rali-mili buda tom paida kita ate asim usa nu palatade rahe. Phira asim usa nu sunana vala ate dekhana vala bana dita
Asim hi usa nu raha samajha'i'a, cahe uha sukara karana vala bane jam na-sukara
Asim avagi'akari'am la'i beri'am ate tauka (gale da pata) ate bharakadi ho'i aga ti'ara kara rakhi hai
Neka loka ajihe pi'ali'am nala (saraba) pinage jinham vica kaphura vale pani da misarana hovega
Usa (vagade ho'e) jharane vicom alaha de bade pinage. Uha usa vicom' sakhanva (choti'am nahiram) kadha lainage
Uha loka zaruri kamam nu pura karade hana ate ajihe dinam tom darade hana jisa di sakhati bari vi'apaka hovegi
Ate usa de prema vica fakiram, anatham ate kaidi'am nu bhojana khava'unde hana
Asim jihara tuhanu khava'unde ham, uha alaha di khusi laina la'i hai. Asim tuhade tom na ko'i mu'avaza cahude ham ate na sukaraguzari di icha
Besaka asim apane raba tom usa dina da khaufa rakhade ham jihara valom ika sakhata ate kaura dina hovega
Tam alaha ne usa nu usa dina di sakhati tom baca li'a ate unham nu tazagi ate khusi pradana kiti
Ate unham de sabara de badale unham nu janata ate resami kapare bakhase
Uha takhatam te (sirahani'a) nu dho'a la ke baithe honage. Ute na uha garami da sahamana karanage ate na saradi da
Janatam di cham unham te jhuki ho'i hovegi ate usa de fala unham di pahuca vica honage
Unham de age candi de bhande ate kaca de pi'ale ghuma rahe honage
Sise vi candi de honage, jinha nu pila'una vali'am ne thika adaze anusara bhari'a hovega
Ate uthe unham nu ika hora jama pi'a'i'a javega jisa vica adaraka da misarana hovega
Iha usa vica ika jharanam hai jisa nu “salasabila” kiha janda hai
Ate unham de kola ajihe bace ghuma rahe honage jihare hamesam (naujavana) bace hi rahinage. Tusi' unham nu vekho tam jano ki iha uha mauti hana, jihare khida dite ga'e hana
Ate tusim jithe vi dekhoge (uthe) uha hi mahana ni'amata vala ate azima patasahi dekhonge
Unham de upara patale resama de hare kapare honage ate mote resama de vi ate unham nu candi de kare (kagana) pahina'e janage ate unham da raba unham nu pavitara (saraba) pi'avega
Besaka iha tuhada dala hai ate tuhadi ghala kama'i savikara ho'i
Asim tuhade upara thorha thorha karake kura'ana utari'a
So tusim apane raba te hukama te dhiraja rakho ate usa vica kise papi jam na sukare di gala na mano
Ate sul'ha sama apane raba da nama yada karo
Ate usa nu rata nu vi sijada karo ate rata de lame hise vica vi usa di sifata salaha karo
Iha loka jaladi milana vali ciza cahude hana ate inham ne apane piche ika bhari dina nu chada rakhi'a hai
Asim hi unham nu paida kita ate asim hi unham de dhance nu paka kita ate jadom asim cahange tam unham de badale unham varage hora loka lai avange
Iha ika upadesa hai tam jihara bada cahe apane raba vala (jana vala) raha apana lave
Ate tusim nahim caha sakade paratu iha ki jihara alaha nu manazura hove. Besaka alaha janana vala ate bibeka vala hai
Uha jisa nu cahuda hai apani rahimata vica dakhila dida hai ate usa ne ati'acari'am la'i dukhada'ika saza ti'ara kara rakhi hai
